detail_desc: Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with broderie anglaise. V-neck, covered buttons down the front and short, voluminous, elasticated puff sleeves.

Calf-length, V-neck kaftan in an airy cotton weave. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a seam with a double drawstring at the waist. Concealed press-studs at the front and welt side pockets. Unlined.
Shorts in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist.
Dress in an embroidered crêpe weave with a V-neck at the back, ties at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Vest top in airy, ribbed jersey made from a soft silk and viscose blend with a low-cut neckline at the back.
Long 5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with concealed adjustable elastication at the waist and a zip fly and button.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Short dress in an airy viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a drawstring at one side for a draped effect. Lined at the top.
Short, fitted sports top with a racer back and elasticated hem. The sports top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft, patterned viscose jersey with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim at the top. Double-layered top, an elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with cuffed hems.
V-neck dress in a viscose crêpe weave with short, knot-detail sleeves, a wrapover front with a tie at the waist, and an asymmetric hem.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, ankle-high knitted slippers with faux fur pompoms at the side. Faux fur linings and insoles, and imitation suede soles with anti-slip protectors.

V-neck playsuit in crinkled plumeti chiffon with an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with decorative hole embroidery and trumpet cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs. Jersey inner shorts.
Cycling shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in imitation leather with quilted sections and a small stand-up collar with a tab and press-stud. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Long-sleeved body in jersey with a V-shaped mesh section at the front, a seam at the hips and a microfibre lower section. Concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Non-wired bra in an airy silk blend with lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated hem and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Lined, non-wired, triangle bikini top with a wide hem. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Suede mules with pointed toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs with a zip at the hems.
Metal studs of various sizes. Some pairs with a faceted glass bead and some with plastic beads. Size from 0.3 to 0.9 cm.
Non-wired bra with a lace-covered front and padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
V-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with low dropped shoulders, wide, tapered sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Shorts in a linen blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket. Relaxed Fit.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.
Jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist and contrasting colour stripes down the sides. The cotton content of the trousers is organic.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
V-neck, long-sleeved jumper in soft cashmere in a straight-cut relaxed fit with ribbing around the neckline cuffs and hem.
Fully-fashioned trainers with rubber details, elasticated lacing and loops front and back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Nursing jumper in a cable knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. High slits in the sides for easier nursing access.
Bikini briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 9M-4Y) and ribbed hems.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Jumper in a soft knit with a round neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves in a contrasting colour.
Thin, padded jacket with press-studs down the front and concealed side pockets. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with a print motif, concealed press-stud on the shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Metal Alice band with fabric and imitation leather appliqués and a decoration in the shape of a unicorn horn.
Bra tops in cotton jersey with wide shoulder straps and unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide light support. Covered elastication at the hem. No fasteners.

High-waisted dungarees in washed cotton denim with a V-neck, adjustable, crossover straps with metal fasteners at the back and a fake fly. Patch front pockets, a concealed zip at the back and wide, straight legs.

Straight-cut shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Double-layered yoke with a seam and pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Glittery pencil case with a zip at the top and a print motif on the front with ears at the top. Size 5x5x20 cm.

Outdoor trousers in slightly stretchy fabric with sections in water-repellent functional fabric. Elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, a zipped leg pocket and a drawstring at the hems. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Make-up bag in transparent, patterned plastic with a zip at the top that continues half-way down each short side. Unlined. Size 8.5x10x18 cm.
Short, gently flared dress in soft, ribbed jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and long sleeves. Visible seam down the back. Unlined.

Cold shoulder top in a textured cotton weave containing glittery threads. Narrow shoulder straps and embroidery at the neckline that continues down over the shoulders. Wide, elasticated smocking at the hem.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with front pockets and straps that cross and fasten at the back.
Short skirt in a soft weave with a high waist and sewn-in belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets, pleats front and back and a concealed zip and button at the back.

Calf-length dress in a gently crêped weave with spaghetti shoulder straps, a V-neck and a wrapover front with a concealed fastening and ties at one side. Seam at the waist and a skirt with an asymmetric, flounced hem.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline that has an opening and a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a drawstring and a flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a section in a contrasting colour weave below the hem. The jumper is made partly from recycled polyester.
V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit with buttons down the front and dropped shoulders. Long sleeves, patch pockets and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short dress in woven fabric with a smocked turtle neck and smocked yoke. Long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Heavily draping jersey top with a sheen and short sleeves.
Fitted top in soft cotton and viscose jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a slightly wider neckline and short cap sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.

Short parka in cotton twill with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and concealed press stud at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Pile lining.
Short leather skirt with decorative seams and a zip in the side seam. Lined.
Straight-cut top in a stretchy, textured cotton weave with a round neck and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neck, short sleeves, and gathered seam under the bust for added width and soft draping.
Bra in organic cotton jersey with scalloped trims and lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders.
Top in supersoft viscose jersey with a print motif and sequins on the front, short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise, an opening at the top and small frilled collar that ties at the front. Frills front and back that continue over the shoulders, and a scalloped hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a sheen. High waist with concealed elastication and a gently bell-shaped flare to the hem. Unlined.
